channel.title: Drop rate
channel.description: ok this is so confusing im not used to this kind of server but like for npc drops it says for example a man 1:20 995 50000 995 50000 i dont get that how do i change the rate to like a rare chance of getting?

@passedout wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Drop rate
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Project Insanity, I believe?

If so, here:

Syntax:

A:B    [tab]    C:D    [tab]    C:D    [tab]    C:D
E:F    [tab]    E:F     [tab]    E:F     [tab]    E:F

Variables:
A- The npc’s ID.
B - The drop rate, which is the amount of getting ANY drop from the NPC.
C - An item to be dropped.
D - The item’s amount.
E - Rare Item to be dropped, (Note, it must be on a newer line, or it will process it as a normal item.)
F - The rare item’s amount.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop rate
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

An example

npcdrop = 2263	5509	1	5

2263 - Npc ID

5509 - Item ID

1 - Amount

5 - Chance ( 5% )

Read full topic
